subtitle: GENESIS PIRATES
text:
The year is 2110. 
Ethero Caspain is looking for the biggest treasure in the whole universe: A key to unlock inter-dimensional travel. Will you join him on a quest to explore uncharted territories in the metaverse?

Pirates Of The Metaverse consists of 10,000 digital cyborg pirates sailing across blockchains in the form of NFTs. Drip Studios' genesis series will tell the story of degens banding together to overcome impossible odds.
